presets.metadata.describe.intro: Share of population that lives in the capital, in urban areas and in rural areas, of selected countries, 2014.
presets.metadata.annotate.notes: The UN defines "Urban" differently for each country. To count as "urban", Japanese settlements need to have at least 50,000 inhabitants. In Iceland, 200 inhabitants are enough.

title: Wikimedia projects & their launch dates (Markdown)
data:
Launched;Name
January 2001;[Wikipedia](https://wikipedia.org) ^online encyclopedia^
December 2002;[Wiktionary](https://wiktionary.org) ^online dictionary and thesaurus^
July 2003;[Wikibooks](https://wikibooks.org) ^collection of textbooks^
July 2003;[Wikiquote](https://wikiquote.org) ^collection of quotations^
July 2003;[Wikivoyage](https://wikivoyage.org) ^travel guide^
November 2003;[Wikisource](https://wikisource.org) ^digital library^
September 2004;[Wikimedia Commons](https://commons.wikimedia.org) ^repository of images, sounds, videos, and general media^
September 2004;[Wikispecies](https://species.wikimedia.org) ^taxonomic catalogue of species^
November 2004;[Wikinews](https://wikinews.org) ^online newspaper^
August 2006;[Wikiversity](https://wikiversity.org) ^collection of tutorials and courses, while also serving as a hosting point to coordinate research^
October 2012;[Wikidata](https://wikidata.org) ^knowledge base^
